banish.desc: Place any target tile in its owner's hand.  This tile stays on the battlefield.
banish.label: Banish

bite.desc: Target tile is infected and becomes a Werewolf Rookie while on the battlefield. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
bite.label: Bite

boost.desc: +1 Power to any target tile while on the battlefield. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
boost.label: Boost

combo.desc: This tile does damage equal to its power to a target tile and then attacks the same tile. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
combo.label: Combo

cure.desc: Target tile is cured and becomes a Human Rookie while on the battlefield. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
cure.label: Cure

curse.desc: -1 Power to any target tile while on the battlefield. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
curse.label: Curse

detain.desc: Target tile is detained for the next 4 turns.  A tile cannot attack, move, be targeted or perform any actions of any kind while detained.  This tile stays on the battlefield.
detain.label: Detain

espionage.desc: Destroy any target Officer tile.  This tile goes into its owner's hand afterwards.
espionage.label: Espionage

hardened.desc: Target tile cannot be damaged until after your next turn. This tile stays on the board.
hardened.label: Hardened

illness.desc: -3 Power to target tile until after your next turn. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
illness.label: Illness

infect.desc: Target tile is infected and becomes a Rookie of this tile's faction while on the battlefield. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
infect.label: Infect

inspire.desc: +1 Power to all non-Officer tiles in your faction until after your next turn. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
inspire.label: Inspire

lash.desc: +3 Power to any tile until after your next turn. This tile goes into its owner's hand.
lash.label: Lash

martyr.desc: Destroy target tile.  The Martyr is also destroyed in the process.
martyr.label: Martyr

transport.desc: Trade places between any two target tiles of your own faction.  This tile goes into its owner's hand.
transport.label: Transport
